title: Imitation
overview: Ma Ha is a member of girl group Teaparty. The other members are Ri Ah Â and Hyun Ji. Since their debut, they haven't achieved much success. Ma Ha has received some attention due to her resemblance to popular singer Ri-Ma.Teaparty then takes part in a reality TV program, involving popular idol groups participating in sporting events. Ma Ha wants to catch the attention of viewers. Meanwhile, Kwon Ryuk is member of popular boy band Shax. He is well liked and is good at singing, dancing, and acting. He is also focused on maintaining his success. He doesn't like Ma Ha, who imitates the appearance of popular singer Ri Ma. During the TV program, Hyuk from boy band Shax gets injured due to Ma Ha. Kwon Ryuk bursts out with anger at Ma Ha. She also receives hate from other people. Ma Ha doesn't want to see Kwon Ryuk anymore, but they cross paths on TV programs and while performing in a drama series.
